updates.title: New Weapon + Balancing changes
updates.content:
- New weapon: X45 Automatic Pistol, sniper class sidearm
- Buffed sniper fire delay
- Nerfed sniper magazine capacity
- Redid some sound effects
- Added tutorial to main menu
- Added line of sight mechanic

updates.title: Misc. Changes
updates.content:
- Tweaks to dm_dunes
- Bullet tracers are now interpolatated to appear to move through space
- Crates are less rounded

updates.title: Menu additions
updates.content:
- This changelog has been added to the main menu
- Various improvements and additions to UI

updates.title: Wow, a new menu
updates.content: - A new, modern menu rework has been rolled out

updates.title: Fluid gameplay, finally!
updates.content: - Interpolation has been completely smoothed out.

updates.title: New map!!
updates.content:
- New map: dm_dunes. As the name suggests, this level plays with the deathmath mode
- Miscellaneous tweaks to weapons and interpolation

updates.title: More tweaks.
updates.content:
- Tweaked movement
- Added some features to debug mode
- Miscellaneous optimizations
- Added moving and standing accuracies for weapons
- Updated weapon icons
- Added sounds for firing and reloading weapons

updates.title: Minor Tweaks: More of them.
updates.content:
- Ingame HUD has recieved a rework
- Particles move more fluidly
- Changed some visuals for weapon recoil animations
- Bullets have been optimized
- Added animations for changing between scope FOVs

updates.title: Minor Tweaks + A New Weapon
updates.content:
- Added survival knife
- Added point to hp_dunes
- Kills grant 5 points
- Standing on the point grants 1 point every 3 seconds
- Added detailings on the ground of the map

updates.title: Various Small Improvements
updates.content:
- Added T509 Pistol
- Added more clutter to the sides of the map hp_dunes, fixed some hitboxes
- Added debug view, toggleable with the i key
- Added cartridges
- Added particles
- Added secondary weapon support
- Weapons now have signature move speeds
- Added weapon selection menu visible when a game is entered
